product_name: Sea to Summit Delta Cutlery Set
long_description: Made of food-grade glass-reinforced nylon, the Sea to Summit Delta Cutlery Set includes a knife, fork and spoon. A carabiner clips the set together so nothing gets lost while you're camped out. Glass-reinforced nylon is lightweight, BPA-free and dishwasher-safe; material also resists stains and odors. Knife includes a serrated edge and plain edge. Sea to Summit Cutlery Set is designed to be stored inside the Delta Bowl (sold separately).
short_description: Made of food-grade glass-reinforced nylon, the Sea to Summit Delta Cutlery Set includes a knife, fork and spoon. A carabiner clips the set together so nothing gets lost while you're camped out.
